Welcome to the Agaves Cantina!

Bringing you all the delicious flavors of Mexico. We use quality, fresh ingredients in all our dishes. Take a look at our menu!
our menu 
Reviews

review by - YELP

Shannon D:

Excellent service, food and drinks. The prices are so reasonable too, zero complaints, 10:10 recommend! You will not be disappointed!

review by - YELP

Joan W:

Very open interior with tons of seating, booths and indoor and outdoor bar space...Lots of staff, great drink menu and the food is delicious. Carnitas Verde! Our favorite location!
